forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming less numerous during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 12C. SSW winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 54F. SSW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 13C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 14C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 58F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 46F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 66F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low near 10C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low near 50F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 64F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 11C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 52F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
